import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ReportService } from '../report.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-report-viewer', templateUrl: './report-viewer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./report-viewer.component.css'] }) export class ReportViewerComponent { applicationNo: string = ''; reportData: any[] = []; isLoading = false; message: string = ''; constructor(private reportService: ReportService) { } async searchReport() { this.isLoading = true; this.reportData = await this.reportService.getReport(this.applicationNo); this.isLoading = false; if (this.reportData.length === 0) { this.message = 'No data found for the given ID.'; } else { this.message = ''; } } }
